title: PatternText
description: JSON Schema for the configuration parameters from the REST API.

Fragments.description: List of Fragments. Fragments either represent a text building block or an input-field.

URL.description: URL that references the corrisponding element within the pattern

Value.description: Predefined value for an input field. Optional

Options.description: List of allowed values. Only if type is Enumeration

TypeMofifiable.description: Indicates if type of parameter is flexible and can be changed.
